text: Ropica angusticollis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Pascoe in 1865. It is known from Borneo.BioLib.cz - Ropica angusticollis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ropica (genus) Category:Beetles described in 1865
title: Ropica angusticollis
